document.full_text: in a 5-to-4 ruling tuesday, the supreme court threw out the award in favor of a former death row inmate who was freed after prosecutorial misconduct came to light.
document.title: $14 million jury award to ex-inmate is dismissed
lines_and_colors: in a 5-to-4 ruling tuesday, the supreme court threw out the award in favor of a former death row inmate who was freed after prosecutorial misconduct came to light.
